overview: The story of a team of Dragonladies, nine women age 27 to 77, from various backgrounds, who only have one thing in common: they've survived breast cancer. Their goal: take part in the Voga Longa regatta in Venice. Under the leadership of their coach, they've got to put aside their differences and their fears, to learn to row - or rather, paddle - together.
title: Vogue la vie
